item.title: Dietary change in high-income nations alone can lead to substantial double climate dividend
item.description:

Nature food
Zhongxiao Sun $^{1,2}$, Laura Scherer $^{1}$, Arnold Tukker $^{1,3}$, Seth A. Spawn-Lee $^{4,5}$, Martin Bruckner $^{6}$, Holly K. Gibbs $^{4,5}$ & Paul Behrens $^{1,7}$
